nodes.text: Gholan was a Devaronian male criminal who was imprisoned in Belsavis prison during the Galactic War. A crazed Force-sensitive with some training, Gholan somehow survived four execution attempts by the Galactic Republic, forcing the Republic to send him to Belsavis. During the invasion of Belsavis by the Sith Empire, Gholan stole the key to Marshal Ellis Ruger's guard station, and refused all of the Empire's offers to trade for the key. As a result, Lord Medechas dispatched Imperial forces to kill Gholan and retrieve the key.
Gholan appears on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where he is the target of the Imperial mission "Fifth Time's the Charm."
